text: Lajos HomonnaiHe is also known as Lajos Hlavacsek. (born May 2, 1904, date of death unknown) was a Hungarian water polo player who competed at the 1924 Summer Olympics. Born in Budapest, he was part of the Hungarian team in the 1924 tournament, in which he played three matches, but he wasn't won any Olimpycs. ==Footnotes== Category:1904 births Category:Year of death missing Category:Hungarian male water polo players Category:Olympic water polo players of Hungary Category:Water polo players at the 1924 Summer Olympics Category:Sportspeople from Budapest
title: Lajos Homonnai
